title: Facebook's stock hits record high, signaling recovery after extended historic slump

title: Facebook's stock hits all-time high after BofA analyst gets more bullish

FB, +0.43% edged up 0.4% in morning trading Friday, and reached a record high in intraday trading, after BofA Securites analyst Justin Post said he was now a little more bullish on the social media company, citing expected "green shoots" monetization initiatives and managed expenses.
